subject: Free Agents (Sports)
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Welcoming Carmelo Anthony on his free-agency tour, Houston used the jersey number currently worn by the Rockets’ Jeremy Lin, a former Knicks teammate of Anthony’s, as part of its appeal.
snippet: Welcoming Carmelo Anthony on his free-agency tour, Houston used the jersey number currently worn by the Rockets’ Jeremy Lin, a former Knicks teammate of Anthony’s, as part of its appeal.
